email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a client looking to move 100,000 MT of crude oil from Ras Tanura to Rotterdam. The laycan is 15-20 October. Could you provide a freight quote for this? Looking forward to your response. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for reaching out. For this shipment, we can offer a rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per MT. The vessel we have in mind is the MV Ocean Star, DWT 120,000, LOA 250m. Let me know if this works for your client. Cheers, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for the quick response. My client is considering your offer but is looking for a rate closer to $49.50 per MT. Also, could you confirm the laytime and demurrage terms? Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, I understand your client's position. We can adjust the rate to $49.75 per MT. Laytime is 72 hours total, and demurrage is set at $20,000 per day pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for the revised offer. My client has agreed to the rate of $49.75 per MT and the demurrage terms. Please confirm the laycan dates and vessel details for the final contract. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, great to hear that. The laycan remains 15-20 October, and the vessel is confirmed as MV Ocean Star. I'll send over the final contract shortly. Thanks for your cooperation. Best, John
